name: Creepy Chocolate Maze
description:
!!! Warning: the game has screen shake !!!

You're trapped in a maze full of chocolates, you gotta eat them because well .. that's the only thing you can do.

Fortunately you can see the maze walls so this game should be very easy hehe!

Game made for Trijam #108 and Löve Jam 2021

The theme of the jams were: "Creepy vibes" and "Chocolate"

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls
  • WASD or arrow keys to move

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits

Screen shake library: https://github.com/Ulydev/shack

Font used: https://www.1001fonts.com/metal-macabre-font.html

sprites: https://opengameart.org/content/super-candy-set-m484-games

Music: "Creepy action" by Eric Matyas www.soundimage.org

sounds:

  • move: https://freesound.org/people/el_boss/sounds/546119/
  • click / error: https://opengameart.org/content/jrpg-style-ui-sounds
  • eat: https://opengameart.org/content/80-cc0-creature-sfx

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made with Löve 2D version 11.3

Source code available here

Maze generated using Aldous-Broder algorithm

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Key takeaways
  • I think adding screen shake and blinking walls at the very end made the game a lot nicer
  • Get a spritesheet with defined positions and sizes next time, so many nice candies that i couldn't use because i would have to manually test a lot to get the correct sprite on the screen

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Install instructions

For browser version, try to play it on Google Chrome on normal mode (not incognito)

If the browser version doesn't work, try to download windows or mac version.

Mac: click with right button > Open
